author: Kirin
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Patron cog! Use `[p]help patreonset` to see all available commands.
name: Patron
short: Send award messages for both new and recurring Patreon donations
description: This cog connects to Patreon's API to fetch donation data and automatically sends award messages for both new patrons and monthly recurring donations. Uses format: `.award {amount} @discordusername` where amount is calculated as 3000 per 1 EUR donated with additional percentage bonuses for higher donation tiers.
